name: Trichromatic Witch
description:
Trichromatic Witch is a short puzzle game based on the theme Joined Together. This game is for GMTK 2021. 

Controls: 

Press Arrow keys to move 

Hold SPACE to move color elements

Hold Q & press Arrow keys to combine color elements 

Hold W & press Arrow keys to separate color elements

Credits:

Design: Sizhe Xu, Chienn

Art: Tanuki, Canger, Bibi, NIKURO

Programmer: Xiaomeng Li, EndEdge, TomCat

Sound: Apuru
